Token.Abstract: The AlfrescoRepositorySession manages the session with an Alfresco Repository.
- the server URL used to establish a session - Required

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: - the server URL used to establish a session - Required

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: (AlfrescoSessionCompletionBlock). The block that's called with the session in case the operation succeeds. - required

ReturnValue.Abstract: an instance of the repository session

Token.Abstract: - the server URL used to establish a session - Required

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: - the server URL used to establish a session - Required

Parameter.Name: parameters
Parameter.Abstract: a dictionary containing parameters for the session. - Optional (can be nil)

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: (AlfrescoSessionCompletionBlock). The block that's called with the session in case the operation succeeds. - required

ReturnValue.Abstract: an instance of the repository session
